notes: Mother Brain is a long-running daemon/service for world simulation decisions.
v0.1 is a runnable skeleton (heartbeat + env config validation).
v0.2 adds read-only awareness probes (DB + WS connectivity snapshots).
v0.3 bridges Planar War PW_DB_* env vars into a usable Postgres URL and logs basic DB metadata (server version, current database).
v0.4 adds read-only brain:* spawn_points summary (counts by shard/type) for quick visibility of planned waves in the DB.
Future slices will add wave planning (DB) and GoalRunner black-box testing (WS).
